content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” gap=”30″ use_container=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1622473039072{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #f0f1f3 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1584806111490{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][ts_about_text_content animate_block=”yes” animation_type=”fadeInUp”]

Join The Prime Team

Join our team of goal-oriented individuals.

[/ts_about_text_content][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1584806138319{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-7″][ts_about_text_content animate_block=”yes” animation_type=”fadeInUp”]PWAN-Prime has a team of committed, knowledgeable real estate brokers with a wide range of professional backgrounds and portfolios. Using the knowledge and abilities of our entire team enables us to provide our clients with the highest level of service and specialization while also delivering unique and integrated real estate solutions.[/ts_about_text_content][vc_single_image image=”1494″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-5″][ts_about_text_content animate_block=”yes” animation_type=”fadeInUp” animation_delay=”0.05s”]We are looking for sales agents or associate partners with prior commercial real estate experience to join our team. Please send us your resume or use the contact form below to be considered.[/ts_about_text_content]

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
